verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Whatever is true, whatever is right,
Whatever is pure, whatever is lovely,
We will fix our thoughts on these things.
Jesus You're true, Jesus You're right,
Jesus You're pure, You are lovely,
We will fix our thoughts on You.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus, who is like You,
Who is like You,
Who is like You,
Who is like You,
Who is like You.
